articles.description: The Kiwi pop queen is set to return to the stage here at home for the first time since her sold out 2017 national tour.
articles.content:

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: 'Tough' Kai Sotto impresses Tab Baldwin after first Gilas Pilipinas stint - Rappler
articles.description: Kai Sotto, 19, holds his own against more experienced foes as he helps Gilas Pilipinas sweep the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: Sotto's finest game numbers-wise came in their stunning 81-78 victory over Korea, where he churned out 11 points, 7 rebounds, 2 assists, and 1 steal in only 18 minutes.
